alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 24 at 2:41PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While most areas are expected to remain above freezing tonight, there may be some localized areas that see temperatures as low as 31 degrees for a few hours, especially along the higher terrain and inland of the North Shore. Freezing temperatures are not expected along the immediate coastline of Lake Superior.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
